options.name: Bounty of the Land
options.description: The Stout-Folk are a culture that works the soil, from farmers to miners. Gain +1 Wilderness, +1 Smithing and +1 Cooking.

options.name: Action : Throwing Arm
options.description: You make a Throwing Attack with a +2 Bonus to Attack and double the Range you can normally throw that object or weapon. Additionally, a True Hit on this Attack is upgraded to a Critical Hit

options.name: Tavern Legends
options.description: The Stout-Folk culture is renowned for their prowess in the tavern. Gain +1 Resilience. When you complete a Favorable Full Rest after a day where you have consumed alcohol, gain a Luck Dice.

options.name: Truefooted
options.description: The Stout-Folk culture does not place much stock in footwear and have grown comfortable barefoot, growing protective calluses. Gain +1 Acrobatics, +1 Stealth and +1 Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Heavy Metal
options.description: The Stout-Folk are renowned for their complex metalwork, resulting in impressive hammers and plate armor. Gain an Infusion Slot when crafting Bludgeoning Weapons and Heavy Armor. Additionally, gain +1 Damage with Bludgeoning Weapons.

options.name: Action : Giantsbane
options.description: You make an Attack with a Weapon against a Creature one or more sizes larger than you and deal an extra 1d10 Primary Damage for each Size difference.

options.name: Legacy of Armor
options.description: The Stout-Folk are renowned for utilizing heavier armors for protection. Gain +1 Block, Resistance and Dodge while wearing Medium or Heavy Armor.
